sentences.en: All the people of the land shall give this oblation for the prince in Israel.
sentences.cn: 16此地的民都要奉上这供物给以色列中的王.

sentences.en: All the people of the land shall give this oblation the prince in Israel.
sentences.cn: 此地的民、都要奉上这供物给以色列中的王.

sentences.en: All the people the land shall give this oblation the prince in Israel.
sentences.cn: 此地的民都要奉上这供物给以色列中的王.

sentences.en: And if his oblation be a sacrifice of peace offering， if he offer it of the herd； whether it be a male or female， he shall offer it without blemish before the LORD.
sentences.cn: 人献供物为平安祭（平安或作酬恩下同），若是从牛群中献，无论是公的是母的，必用没有残疾的献在耶和华面前。

sentences.en: Then the king Nebuchadnezzar fell upon his face, and worshipped Daniel, and commanded that they should offer an oblation and sweet odours unto him.
sentences.cn: 当时，尼布甲尼撒王俯伏在地，向但以理下拜，并且吩咐人给他奉上供物和香品。

sentences.en: Thinkers and poets throughout the ages have offered the courtesan the oblation of their mercy.
sentences.cn: 各个时期的思想家和诗人都把仁慈的怜悯心奉献给娼家女子.
